page.title: 06Cressage Bakery
page.content: {The Bakery}is on the{Shrewsbury}side of the village. The baker is Mr.Horler. He lives in Oak Meadow in Cressage.He bakes 3 {different types of bread,}ordinary white bread ,whole meal and granary. They produce 2000 loaves a week in ovens heated by{electricty.} He showed us his{computer.}It was a Sirius. Mr.Horler has 100-150 customers in the shop a each day.Saturday is the busiest day.The bakery opens at 8.30am and closes at 6.00pm. At the bakery ten people{work,}6 full time and 4 part time. The bakery{sells}all sorts of different cakes like the Long Iced Buns which cost 16p,Scones which is 12p,Hot Cross Buns are 12p and a Christmas cake is Â£5.50,Jam Swiss Roll is 60p.The bread costs 50p a loaf.
